ComicInfo.Summary:
Monsters on the move in The Vast! Jana and the rest of her new team have trained their beasts for the battle ahead - going after Apex! A More Perfect Union sees the true medicinal value of the insect discovered while in Code Pru the ghost of her parents are tormenting Pru.
Modded gears up for Chainsaw Reggae Rhythm Action while Alan Moore and Kevin O'Neill weave a tale in the tapestry of cinematic history. The finest anthology in history continues. Join a master class of sequential artisans as they spin stories to terrify and delight. Now showing: Cinema Purgatorio by Alan Moore and Kevin O'Neill, A More Perfect Union by Max Brooks and Gabriel Andrade, Code Pru by Garth Ennis and Raulo Caceres, Modded by Kieron Gillen and Nahuel Lopez, and The Vast by Christos Gage and Gabriel Andrade. Each story has its own cover by the series artist and there is also an Ancient Tome Premium edition limited to 1000 copies.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------|-----------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Kevin O'Neil | 1 | | PU | Perfect Union Cover | Gabriel Andrade | 2 | | CPC | Code Pru Cover | Raulo Caceres | 3 | | MC | Modded Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 4 | | VC | The Vast Cover | Gabriel Andrade | 5 | | AT | Ancient Tome Premium Cover, Limited to 1000 | Gabriel Andrade | 6 |
ComicInfo.Title: A Clever Girl
ComicInfo.Writer: Alan Moore,Christos N. Gage,Garth Ennis,Kieron Gillen,Max Brooks
